reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 4/03: DESIGNATION - RECYCLING SPECIALITIES INC. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATION — RECYCLING SPECIALTIES INC. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 4/03: DESIGNATION - RECYCLING SPECIALITIES INC. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Assessment Act   Loi sur les évaluations environnementales

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “Recycling Specialties Inc. site” means the North Half of Lot 29, Concession 10, Township of Smith-Ennismore-Lakefield in the County of Peterborough. O. Reg. 4/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“Recycling Specialties Inc. site” means the North Half of Lot 29, Concession 10, Township of Smith-Ennismore-Lakefield in the County of Peterborough. O. Reg. 4/03, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Any enterprise or activity of establishing or operating a landfill at the Recycling Specialties Inc. site is defined as a major commercial business enterprise or activity, and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 4/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Any enterprise or activity of establishing or operating a landfill at the Recycling Specialties Inc. site is defined as a major commercial business enterprise or activity, and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 4/03, s. 2.
